item.title: Building A Decentralized, self-perpetuating, transparent Giving Network
item.description: Colony Hackathon Submission A decentalized, self-perpuating, cross-border giving network on top of COLONY Project Description Goal: To create a self-perpetuating, decentralized, cross-borders, Giving Platform. Overview: We aim to create a platform where users can create projects, work on projects and fund projects to help people around the globe. By the nature of design of the platform, there is a complete transparency in the way the funding works and the way funds are disbursed.
